alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 12:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. Johns, northern Putnam and southern Clay Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1215 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Florahome, or 9 miles north of Interlachen, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Hastings, East Palatka, George`s Lake, Florahome, Bostwick, Melrose Landing, Federal Point, Orange Mills and Bardin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam
